# biliass

biliass，只是 Danmaku2ASS 的 bilili 与 yutto 适配版原版：仅支持 bilibili 弹幕，支持 XML 弹幕和 Protobuf 弹幕## Install```bashpip install biliass```## Usage```bash# XML 弹幕biliass danmaku.xml -s 1920x1080 -o danmaku.ass# protobuf 弹幕biliass danmaku.pb -s 1920x1080 -f protobuf -o danmaku.ass``````pythonfrom biliass import Danmaku2ASS# xmlDanmaku2ASS( xml_text_or_bytes, width, height, input_format="xml", reserve_blank=0, font_face="sans-serif", font_size=width / 40, text_opacity=0.8, duration_marquee=15.0, duration_still=10.0, comment_filter=None, is_reduce_comments=False, progress_callback=None,)# protobufDanmaku2ASS( protobuf_bytes, # only bytes width, height, input_format="protobuf", reserve_blank=0, font_face="sans-serif", font_size=width / 40, text_opacity=0.8, duration_marquee=15.0, duration_still=10.0, comment_filter=None, is_reduce_comments=False, progress_callback=None,)```## TODO- 导出 bilibili 网页上的弹幕设置，并导入到 biliass
